title: The Angel's Virtue
description: In the final novel to The Gateway Sin series, Amity is forced to seduce the souls of the Underworld with Heaven’s light without Kylar standing supportively at her side. Punished by Lucifer, Amity is entrusted to Kronos, Demon of Treachery and ruler of The Ninth Circle of Hell.As Amity pushes her light forward despite the pain and temporary loss of Kylar in her heart, she cultivates a valuable friendship with Kronos. But sending her light out to the souls in Hell doesn’t just gain their loyalty, but the Circle’s of Hell are no longer trapping the souls on Earth with Sin.Enraged at the dropping number of souls crossing into Hell, Lucifer threatens the birth of more Legions in the Underworld, and all Hell breaks lose as Heaven retaliates. The Apocalypse has begun and a war must be fought. Souls alive and deceased team as Angels and Demons war.In the end, will Kylar and Amity push through the difficulties faced or will the ties Hell has over his soul be too strong for him to break?
author: Alannah Carbonneau
